protein.specific_function: The purine nucleoside phosphorylases catalyze the phosphorolytic breakdown of the N-glycosidic bond in the beta-(deoxy)ribonucleoside molecules, with the formation of the corresponding free purine bases and pentose-1-phosphate.

go_class.description: nucleobase, nucleoside and nucleotide metabolic process
nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
NAD biosynthesis via nicotinamide riboside salvage pathway
positive regulation of alpha-beta T cell differentiation
positive regulation of T cell proliferation
